Name: Flank That Tank!
About the game: Twin Stick Shooter where everything breaks! Smash through walls, punch through obstacles, every thing is possible in the game with procedural destruction. In 22 fun-packed levels, you crash through anything to mop up all opponents. The opponents come in five different difficulty levels. Use the pick-ups to gain an edge over the enemy. Gamepad Controls: LEFT STICK to move your tank. RIGHT STICK to aim your gun. SHOULDER BUTTONS to fire your gun. Keyboard Controls: Cursor keys to drive. Left Mouse Button to fire.
